title: Adidas tongue text
content:
Hi!

I just got a pair of Adidas consortium Stan Smith 1 Graph sneakers and I would love to know what typeface they used for the tongue text. This is the best picture i managed to get.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905040402im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/a1_5877.jpg)

 [‹ heavy rounded 50s script needed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905040402/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44761 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for a font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905040402/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44771 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kneckenbauer

comments.content: Avant Garde Gothic and it Alternate. [E&F version](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905040402/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner_flake/avant_garde_gothic_alternate/) and [ITC Version](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905040402/http:/www.itcfonts.com/Fonts/NewFonts/2005/Oct2005.htm)
